statements: SELECT * FROM learning_materials;
SELECT material_title, material_type FROM learning_materials WHERE material_length > 60;
SELECT material_id, material_title FROM learning_materials WHERE material_length < 120 ORDER BY material_id DESC;
SELECT material_title, material_url FROM learning_materials WHERE material_type = 'Video' AND material_uploaded_by = 'John Doe';
SELECT material_type, material_length FROM learning_materials WHERE material_uploaded_by = 'Alice Smith' ORDER BY material_length ASC, material_type DESC;
SELECT material_title, material_type FROM learning_materials WHERE material_length > 60 ORDER BY material_title DESC;
SELECT * FROM learning_materials WHERE material_type = 'Video' AND material_length > 120 ORDER BY material_length ASC;
SELECT material_id, material_title, material_url FROM learning_materials WHERE material_uploaded_by = 'John Doe' ORDER BY material_id;
SELECT material_title, material_type, material_length FROM learning_materials WHERE material_length BETWEEN 30 AND 90 ORDER BY material_length DESC;
SELECT material_id, material_type, material_length, material_url FROM learning_materials WHERE material_type IN ('Document', 'PDF') ORDER BY material_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM LectureVideos;
SELECT video_title, video_url FROM LectureVideos;
SELECT video_title, video_url FROM LectureVideos WHERE video_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM LectureSlides;
SELECT slide_title, slide_url FROM LectureSlides WHERE slide_id = 2;
SELECT video_id, video_title, video_url FROM LectureVideos WHERE video_id = 1;
SELECT video_title, video_url, video_id FROM LectureVideos WHERE video_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY video_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM LectureVideos INNER JOIN LectureSlides ON LectureVideos.video_id = LectureSlides.slide_id;
SELECT slide_id, slide_title, slide_url FROM LectureSlides WHERE slide_id = 1;
SELECT video_title, video_url, video_id FROM LectureVideos WHERE video_title LIKE '%SQL%' ORDER BY video_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM lecture_videos WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, duration FROM lecture_videos WHERE duration > 30;
SELECT * FROM slides WHERE slide_number BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT title, author FROM readings WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT id, title FROM lecture_videos ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT id, title FROM lecture_videos WHERE duration > 60;
SELECT * FROM slides WHERE slide_number <= 10 ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT title, author FROM readings WHERE author LIKE '%Jane%';
SELECT id, title, duration FROM lecture_videos WHERE title LIKE '%SQL%' OR title LIKE '%database%';
SELECT id, url, slide_number FROM slides WHERE url != '' AND slide_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM courses;
SELECT course_name, lecturer FROM courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, lecturer FROM courses WHERE lecturer = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM lectures_videos ORDER BY video_title DESC;
SELECT course_name, COUNT(*) AS lecture_count FROM lectures_videos JOIN courses ON lectures_videos.course_id = courses.course_id GROUP BY course_name;
SELECT * FROM lecture_videos WHERE video_id = 1;
SELECT video_title, video_url FROM lecture_videos WHERE video_id = 2 ORDER BY video_title DESC;
SELECT course_name, lecturer FROM courses WHERE course_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM slides JOIN readings ON slides.slid_id = readings.reading_id;
SELECT course_name, lecturer, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM lecture_videos) AS video_count FROM courses WHERE course_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM lecture_videos;
SELECT video_title, video_url FROM lecture_videos WHERE course_id = '123456' ORDER BY video_title DESC;
SELECT video_title, video_id FROM lecture_videos WHERE video_title LIKE 'Introduction%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM slides LEFT JOIN courses ON slides.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM lecture_videos WHERE course_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT video_title, video_url FROM lecture_videos WHERE video_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT s.slide_title, c.course_title FROM slides s INNER JOIN courses c ON s.course_id = c.course_id;
SELECT r.reading_title, r.reading_url, c.course_title FROM readings r INNER JOIN courses c ON r.course_id = c.course_id;
SELECT student_id, student_name, student_email FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
